description:
üêö WebView2 and Qt6-based shell, desktop app for Stremio with latest web ui support

Stremio Desktop app with the latest Stremio web UI v5, built with WebView2
‚ú® Stremio Shell (Desktop) 5.0.20
- Stremio Shell build to work with latest stremio-web using fixed web ui
üì¶ Installation
1. Using the Installer: Download Stremio-5.0.20-x64.exe and run it.
> ‚è≥ Note: Preferably use x64 as this improves player limits especially on high end system. Only use x86 if u are sure what u are doing.
2. Using the Portable-Archive: Download Stremio-5.0.20-x64.7z extract it and run stremio.exe
> ‚è≥ Note: This build is fully portable and includes WebView2 - First start takes ~20 Seconds as portable browser has to be setup as well.
üöÄ Changelog
- Added Support for custom WebMods. This allows loading custom js or css on startup of the app.
- With the new WebMods feature added a custom working version of the Stremio Glass theme by @Fxy6969 is added to this release.
> ‚è≥ Note: For the Stremio Glass theme to work use the attached version in this release as it has fixes to work properly with this stremio community version as the original theme was made for a electron fork using the web player of stremio.
Theme Preview
Install Theme
Theme Installation
Install Theme
Install Theme by drag and dropping the portable config into the installation folder.
Theme Uninstall
Uninstall Theme
Uninstall Theme by deleting the liquid-glass-theme folder inside the portable_config/webmods folder.
> ‚ö†Ô∏è Note: This theme may have UI-breaking bugs. I‚Äôve patched the obvious issues, but the original targets an Electron fork, so it isn‚Äôt fully compatible with the community Stremio app as this app is based on the offical Stremio app (WebView2).
üåç Web Changelog
- Added a default Playbackspeed multiselect to the settings
- Fixed settings color input not working (09.09.25)
- Added latest Animejanai 3.2.0. File is split in 2 parts, download both. (09.09.25)
> ‚ù§Ô∏èBig thanks to @Fxy6969 for making the Stremio Glass theme.
